faq.question: Does PT Sarana Mulya Logistik have a complete license?
faq.answer: PT Sarana Mulya Logistik already has complete domestic licenses such as ISO 9001, ISO 45001, Asperindo, Kominfo, and SIUJPT.

faq.question: What is the percentage of insurance cover of PT Sarana Mulya Logistik?
faq.answer: PT Sarana Mulya Logistik compensates according to damage/loss up to 99.001%.

faq.question: Does PT Sarana Mulya Logistik have pick up time and delivery?
faq.answer: PT Sarana Mulya Logistik provides pick up time and delivery at office hour precisely at 9:00 to 17:00 WIB or can coordinate with internal parties (customize).

faq.question: How long is the POD Balik lead time?
faq.answer: For City coverage +/-: 4 - 7 days For county town +/-: 14 - 20 days
